import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' const Checkout = () => { let initialquant; if (localStorage.getItem("quantity")) { initialquant = localStorage.getItem("quantity") } else { initialquant = 1 } const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(initialquant) let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) || {} console.log(getCartdata) let requireddetail = getCartdata.length ? getCartdata.map((item) => { return { ...item.productData[0] } }) : null let sum = requireddetail ? requireddetail.reduce((accumulator, curValue) => accumulator + parseFloat(curValue.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal), 0) : null const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState() const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(requireddetail) let sellPrice = requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((item) => { parseFloat(item.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal) }) : "" useEffect(() => { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) }, []) useEffect(() => { setTotalAmount(sum) }, [sum]) const increment = () => { setQuantity(quantity + 1) requireddetail.forEach(ele => { sum = sum + (parseInt(ele.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal) * quantity) console.log("incccc", sum) setTotalAmount(sum) }) } const decrement = () => { if (quantity === 1) { return } else { setQuantity(quantity - 1) requireddetail.forEach(ele => { sum = (parseInt(ele.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal) * quantity) - sum console.log("dec", sum) console.log("quant", quantity) setTotalAmount(sum) console.log("ttttt", totalAmount) }) } } console.log(typeof (quantity)) // localStorage.setItem("quantity", quantity) // useEffect(() => { // if (localStorage.getItem("quantity")) { // setQuantity(localStorage.getItemJSON.parse(("quantity"))) // } // }, []) localStorage.setItem("quantity",quantity) let raw = local return ( <>

order summary

{requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((curr, index) => { return (
{curr.Title}{curr?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal}{curr?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
) }) : null}
